snippet: America’s acceptance of a coup will lead Islamists to lose faith in elections.
abstract: Op-Ed article by policy expert Shadi Hami urges Obama administration to distance itself from Egyptian army's ouster of Pres Mohamed Morsi and to instead pressure military to respect rights of Islamists; contends America's acceptance of coup will lead Islamists to lose faith in democratic process and will lead to violence.
lead_paragraph: America’s acceptance of a coup will lead Islamists to lose faith in elections.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
